head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KILCARR, J. KENNETH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KILCARR, J. KENNETH

block.p: KILCARR-J. Kenneth. of Mahwah, NJ, on Wednesday, July 12, 2000. Husband of Janet Kilcarr. Father of Joan Dannenberg, Barbara Stasio, Clare Frey and John Kilcarr. Brother of Myles Kilcarr and Rev. Stephen Kilcarr. Survived by five grandchildren. Funeral from Becker Funeral Home, 219 Kinderkamack Road, Westwood, NJ on Saturday at 9:30 AM. Funeral liturgy at St. John The Baptist RC Church, Hillsdale, NJ, at 10:30 AM. Interment Maryrest Cemetery, Mahwah, NJ. Visiting Friday 2:00-4:00 and 7:00-9:00 PM. In lieu of flowers memorial gifts to Holy Name Hospital, 718 Teaneck Road, Teaneck, NJ 07666 would be appreciated.

In lieu of flowers memorial gifts to Holy Name Hospital, 718 Teaneck Road, Teaneck, NJ 07666 would be appreciated.
